```{r setup}
library(bisonR)
```

```{r}
data("binary_ex1")
df <- binary_ex1
head(df)
```

```{r}
fit_edge <- edge_model(event ~ dyad(node_1, node_2), data=df, data_type="binary", method="inla", mc_cores=4, verbose=TRUE)
```

```{r}
print(fit_edge, ci=0.8)
```

```{r}
diagnostic_plot(fit_edge)
```
